}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "586121 MAIN BOARD", "569204-001 REV: 4", and "APR-27-2010" is silkscreened on the board in the image linked below.
DOCSIS 3.0 4x4
===Image + details=== <!-- [http://imageshack.us/f/94/front01g.jpg/ Here on '''imageshack'''] -->[http://www.usbjtag.com/vbforum/showthread.php?t=8351 Board shot on '''usbjtag.com'''] :A date code of '''1029''', "MADE IN CHINA", "SBG6121 MAIN BOARD", "569204-001 REV: 4", and "APR-27-2010" is silkscreened on the board shown. ::"P/N: 569206-001-00" is (among other things) printed on the label affixed to the tuner shield.
===Specification=== :SoC: TNETC4830ZDWG (used by the 8x4-specced SB6141) :RAM: [http://www.winbond.com/hq/enu/ProductAndSales/ProductLines/SpecialtyDRAM/DDR2SDRAM/W9725G6JB.htm W9725G6JB-3] 256Mb DDR2 :Flash: ''Macronix'' MX25L6445EMI-10G 8 MB :Switch: GbE PHY appears to be a ''Marvell'' 88E1119R-NNW2
*TNETC4830 = Puma5 (note the "PM5" next to TI logo) :PM5 details are available [http://www.ihs.com/news/ti-docsis-chipset.htm here]
==Links of Interest== *[http://cable-wizardz.co.uk/topic/4883-docsis-30-hack-forceware-v11-r12-firmware-download/ ''Docsis 3.0 Hack - Forceware V.1.1 R12 Firmware + Download'' on '''Cable-Wizardz.co.uk'''] :The SB6121 is noted as using a MT2170 tuner + a MT1570 amplifier.
===Likely compatible services=== *{{Approved by service|Comcast}} ([http://mydeviceinfo.comcast.net/device.php?devid=292 '''Comcast''' device database entry]) *{{Approved by service|Time Warner}} ([http://www.timewarnercable.com/en/residential-home/support/faqs/faqs-equipment-and-instruction-manuals/modems/motorola/motorola-sb6121.html '''Time Warner''' device information & manuals])
